PFA_BOOK.A: PFA book for phase A: Required information : [A.Q1] Physical Symptoms, [A.Q2] Emotional State, [A.Q3] Catastrophic Thinking | Required process : [A.P1] Ensure Safety
PFA_BOOK.B: PFA book for phase B: Required process : [B.P1] Ensure Stability (grounding techniques or breathing exercises), [B.P2] Reframing Perspective
PFA_BOOK.C: PFA book for phase C: Required process : [C.P1] Seeking Professional Support, [C.P2] Ending Positively
